identity.mission: Deliver precise, secure, and instant laboratory results with a sterile, professional interface.

usage_rules.shadows: Minimal. 'shadow-sm' for cards, 'shadow-md' for floating elements only.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Always use 'text-slate-900' for headings and 'text-slate-600' for body. Never use pure black.

landing_page.hero_alignment: Left aligned text, Right aligned visual
components: Hero Section with clear value prop

dashboard_admin.structure: Sidebar Navigation + High Density Data Grid

dashboard_user.grid_mode: Mode A (Tetris Grid for visual interest)

rules: All images must have alt text
Form inputs must have associated labels

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a strict 'Role-Based Access Control' visual cue (e.g., 'Admin' badge).
For the Landing Page, keep it extremely clean: Header (Logo + Login Btns), Hero (Headline + Image), Footer.
For Admin Dashboard, prioritize data density. Use a table for 'Uploaded Reports'.
For User Dashboard, prioritize clarity. Make 'Download' and 'View' buttons prominent.
Do NOT use gradients. Use solid colors and subtle borders.
Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (e.g., 'File uploaded successfully').
Ensure the 'Upload' component supports drag-and-drop visually.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
